reviews.text:
The rooms and bathroom are spacious, locked off parking is provided.
My room had a  little kettle and a fridge as well as a safe which I found helpful. The service is very attentive and friendly. The breakfast is wonderful, from salty items to sweets and fruits.
The location of the hotel was perfect for my business trip but it's 3.5km away from the city centre.

Minimalistic and modern decorated place. Very friendly and professional personnel.  Very clean, big and well ventilated rooms. Breakfast delicious and good displayed.  Next time visiting the lovely Bratislava , I'll stay here! 100% recommended!

Aston is a modern hotel with a strategic location, near to the airport and downtown (15 minutes by public bus).
Very spacious room with good Wifi connection and overall service.
Probably it is a better choice for business travellers, also because of facilities such as conference rooms and parking areas.
Anyway, good value for money if you don't mind to take a bus to get to the city center.

High level of professionalism!

24/7 reception

People who work there really care about client.

Strongly recommend and thanks for nice service!

Appreciate for nice experienceü•∞ü•∞ü•∞

Eventhough the hotelni 4****, the the rooms do not smell well. I also do not find the rooms comfortable-it is just common design. And the breakfast starts only at 7 am ( too late for me, when travelling for business).
